title: Pip-Pong
description: Pip-Pong is a simple game where you control a paddle that hits a ball back and forth.
author: @CodyTolene

meta.controls: Use any knob to move up and down, and the top torch button to exit the game.
meta.instructions: Move the paddle up and down to hit the ball back and forth. Try to keep the ball in play as long as possible.
meta.tip: The ball will bounce off the walls.
